summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas will hold a regular meeting of the Civil Service Board on January 7, 2024, at 9:30 A.M. at Dallas City Hall, Room #1 C-South, with an option for videoconference participation. The purpose of the meeting is to address various administrative matters, including public appeals and departmental updates.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes the approval of minutes from a previous meeting, a hearing on the rehire eligibility appeal of Mr. Noel Balderas from the Housing Department, and discussions on departmental priorities and updates for FY 24-25.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the rehire eligibility appeal for Mr. Balderas, which will be formally heard during the meeting. Additionally, the board will discuss the development and schedule of the annual report and provide updates on departmental activities.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek to make a decision regarding the rehire eligibility appeal of Mr. Balderas. Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting will also be requested. Participants wishing to speak must register in advance, and accommodations are available for those needing assistance to participate fully in the meeting.
